participant_1.background:
I rode horses in the snow with my friends last winter.
i am never still.
I love the challenge of a good fight, but I also enjoy the peace and quiet of practicing my flute.
I used to be a carpenter but I got tired of the long hours.
i am a cheerleader.

participant_2.background:
I have a secret diary that I keep hidden in my room.
I wonder if my co worker likes me back.
I can't stand pizza, but my mom loves it.
I'm proud of my ability to stay calm under pressure.
i live on the third floor in an apartment.

content.text: Hi, what do you like to do?
I like to write in my diary, but I only do it when I'm alone.
My mom reads it and I don't want her to know some things.
Oh, I understand. What do you write about?
My thoughts, and my feelings. Sometimes I write about my co-worker, I think he likes me, but I'm not sure.
That's exciting! Do you want to tell me more about him?
Yeah, his name is Daniel and he's really handsome. He's also very funny and smart.
He sounds like a great guy!
He is! I just wish I knew if he liked me back.
Well, if you want to know, you could always just ask him.
I don't know, I'm too shy.
You could always write him a letter and tell him how you feel.
That's a good idea! I'll do that.
Great! I hope he likes you back!
